predictions.text: Germany HICP flash inflation (YoY) for November 2025 will print between 2.4% and 2.9%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Destatis press release for November 2025 flash HICP (HVPI) shows YoY rate within 2.4%-2.9%.
monitoring_signals: German state CPI prints (e.g., NRW, Bavaria) on Nov 27
Brent price trend and EUR/USD moves
predictions.rationale: Energy base effects and easing core goods keep Germany near mid-2s; services stickiness caps downside.

predictions.text: Spain HICP flash inflation (YoY) for November 2025 will print between 3.4% and 3.9%.
predictions.verification_criteria: INE Spain flash HICP (EU-harmonised CPI) YoY for November 2025 falls within 3.4%-3.9%.
predictions.rationale: Spain’s energy exposure and resilient services push HICP above euro-area average.

predictions.text: U.S. headline PCE Price Index (YoY, SA) for October 2025 will print between 2.8% and 3.2% in the BEA release.
predictions.verification_criteria: BEA Personal Income and Outlays report for Oct 2025 shows total PCE Price Index YoY in 2.8%-3.2%.
predictions.rationale: Goods disinflation offset by steady services keeps headline near 3%.

predictions.text: U.S. JOLTS job openings for October 2025 will print between 7.0 million and 7.6 million.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS JOLTS release for October 2025 reports total job openings (seasonally adjusted) within 7.0–7.6 million.
predictions.rationale: Openings drift lower with cooling labor demand but remain above pre-pandemic norms.

predictions.text: The ECB will leave the Deposit Facility Rate unchanged at 4.00% at its December 2025 meeting.
predictions.verification_criteria: ECB monetary policy decision statement on the meeting date shows Deposit Facility Rate remains 4.00%.
monitoring_signals: Euro OIS path and market-based inflation expectations
predictions.rationale: Inflation easing but not conquered; ECB likely waits for clearer disinflation before cuts.

predictions.text: OPEC+ will announce an extension of current additional voluntary oil production cuts into Q1 2026 (through at least March 2026).
predictions.verification_criteria: Official OPEC/OPEC+ communiqués or member ministry statements confirm extension of existing voluntary cuts through at least March 2026.
predictions.rationale: Price support and inventory management incentives favor extending voluntary curbs.

predictions.text: Apple will publish a security update by 2025-12-31 that notes at least one CVE as "may have been actively exploited."
predictions.verification_criteria: Apple security release notes or HT201222 page include wording indicating at least one actively exploited CVE in a December 2025 update.
predictions.rationale: Recent cadence of monthly patches and frequent in-the-wild WebKit/kernel fixes support likelihood.

predictions.text: Cboe VIX will close at or above 19.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Official Cboe end-of-day VIX value equals or exceeds 19.0 on at least one date before deadline.
predictions.rationale: Seasonal event risk and macro uncertainty leave odds of a volatility spike.

predictions.text: The U.S. Dollar Index (DXY) will close at or above 105.50 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: End-of-day DXY (ICE U.S. Dollar Index) level is ≥ 105.50 on at least one date before deadline.
monitoring_signals: Energy prices impacting terms of trade
predictions.rationale: Any hawkish repricing or risk-off could lift DXY despite recent softness.

predictions.text: The EU will announce at least one new Russia-related sanctions designation by 2025-12-31 via an official Council press release or the Official Journal.
predictions.verification_criteria: EU Council press release or Official Journal entry lists new Russia-related listings before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Escalations in Ukraine or evasion findings
predictions.rationale: Regular EU rollouts and ongoing conflict sustain likelihood of additional listings.

predictions.text: Australia Monthly CPI Indicator for November 2025 will print between 3.6% and 4.1% (YoY).
predictions.verification_criteria: ABS Monthly CPI Indicator (YoY) for November 2025 is within 3.6%-4.1% in the official release.
predictions.rationale: October quickened to 3.8%; November likely similar amid services and housing pressures.

predictions.text: University of Michigan (preliminary) 1-year inflation expectations for December 2025 will print between 2.8% and 3.4%.
predictions.verification_criteria: UMich preliminary December 2025 survey release shows 1-year inflation expectations in 2.8%-3.4%.
predictions.rationale: Expectations remain anchored near 3% with gas prices and news flow as drivers.

predictions.text: China Caixin Services PMI for November 2025 will print between 50.4 and 52.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: S&P Global/Caixin press release for November 2025 Services PMI headline falls within 50.4–52.0.
predictions.rationale: Services expansion persists but remains modest amid uneven recovery.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report will show a U.S. motor gasoline stocks build of +4.0 million barrels or more in at least one report published by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: An EIA weekly report before deadline lists motor gasoline stock change ≥ +4.0 million barrels week-over-week.
monitoring_signals: Import flows and blending component stocks
predictions.rationale: Shoulder-season builds are common with higher refinery runs and softer demand.

predictions.text: From 2025-11-26 close to 2025-12-31 close, Invesco QQQ Trust (QQQ) adjusted-close total return will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 1.5 percentage points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using adjusted closes (dividends reinvested), compute total return for QQQ and SPY between stated dates; QQQ − SPY ≥ +1.5 pp.
monitoring_signals: Rates path and growth vs value performance
predictions.rationale: AI-driven mega-cap momentum and lower long-end yields favor growth-heavy QQQ.
